imdb.plot outline: Brian plays through the newly released Mario + Rabbids Kingdom Battle on the Nintendo Switch. When the worlds of Mario and Rabbids mash together, you get a hodgepodge of looney humor and an awesome gaming experience. Join Brian as he plays through this turn-based, strategyaction game starring Mario, Luigi, Yoshi, Peach, and each of their Rabbid counterparts.
imdb.title: Clip: Mario + Rabbids Kingdom Battle Playthrough
akas: Clip: Mario + Rabbids Kingdom Battle Playthrough (United States)
plot: Brian plays through the newly released Mario + Rabbids Kingdom Battle on the Nintendo Switch. When the worlds of Mario and Rabbids mash together, you get a hodgepodge of looney humor and an awesome gaming experience. Join Brian as he plays through this turn-based, strategyaction game starring Mario, Luigi, Yoshi, Peach, and each of their Rabbid counterparts.
